title: Lavafly
summaries: The Lavafly is a critter that can be used as bait to fish in lava.

Lavaflies will spawn occasionally in the <linked>Underworld</linked> at night. They can be caught with a <linked>Lavaproof Bug Net</linked> or <linked>Golden Bug Net</linked> to be carried around and released later, or put in a <linked>bottle</linked> to be used as furniture and a light source.

Attempting to catch a Lavafly with a standard <linked>Bug Net</linked> will not work, and the player will take 1 damage and be inflicted with <linked>On Fire!</linked> for 5 seconds / <linked>10 seconds</linked> / <linked>13 seconds</linked>.
